title: Instrument Specification Definition
description: The Instrument Specification Definition for Astro CSM

name_model.description: CSM sensor model name. for example: USGS_ASTRO_LINE_SCANNER_SENSOR_MODEL

name_platform.description: CSM sensor platform name. for example: MRO, LRO

name_sensor.description: CSM sensor name. for example: MRO_CTX, LROC

detector_center.description: Center of the detector in pixel coordinates (line, sample)

items.description: The (line, sample) of the center of the detector.

center_ephemeris_time.description: The center ephemeris time of the image

starting_ephemeris_time.description: The starting ephemeris time of the image

focal_length_model.description: The static focal length or the information needed to model a variable focal length

key.description: A key to get information about time/temp dependent focal length models

focal_epsilon.description: The uncertainty of the focal length in mm

image_lines.description: The number of lines in the image

image_samples.description: The the number of samples in the image

radii.description: The radii of the target baody.

semimajor.description: The semi-major axis for the target

semiminor.description: The semi-minor axis for the target

unit.description: The units in m or km

optical_distortion.description: Information needed to convert from undistorted to distorted image plane. Supported optical distortion methods: radial

coefficients.description: optical distortion coefficients generally a 3 value array. For example [0.0, 0.0., 0.0]

items.description: Each coefficient used for the distortion equation in order of increasing degrees.

starting_detector_sample.description: The sample on the detector where the data starts

starting_detector_line.description: The line on the detector where the data starts

focal2pixel_samples.description: Transformation x coefficients from focal plane (mm) to detector pixel coordinates

focal2pixel_lines.description: Transformation y coefficients from focal plane (mm) to detector pixel coordinates

sensor_location.description: (X, Y, Z) location of sensor in body-fixed frame.

sensor_velocity.description: (v_x, v_y, v_z) velocity of sensor in body-fixed frame.

positions.description: (x, y,z) of the sun in body-fixed frame.

unit.description: Unit of sun position values. Recommended in meters (m)

velocities.description: (v_x, v_y, v_z) velocity of sun in body-fixed frame.

sensor_orientation.description: Orientation of the sensor provided in quaternions

quaternions.description: Each quaternion is of the general form: (scalar, vector component, vector component, vector component). The specific form used is that described in the NAIF Quaternions whitepaper under 'SPICE Quaternions' available at: ftp://naif.jpl.nasa.gov/pub/naif/misc/Quaternion_White_Paper/Quaternions_White_Paper.pdf

items.description: Representated as an array of 4 values

line_scan_rate.description: The line rates of the detector map with the associated start line and time

items.description: The (start_line, line_start_time, exposure_time). The exposure time is in seconds and any non-provided values will be set to -1.

detector_sample_summing.description: The summing in the sample-direction. A summing of 1 indicates no summing, summing of 2 indicates 2 pixel summing, 4 indicates 4 pixel summing, etc

apply_light_time_correction.description: A flag to indcate whether the light-time correction should be applied

dt_ephemeris.description: The time between each ephemeris point.

t0_ephemeris.description: First ephemeris time - center image time

t0_quaternion.description: First quaternion time - center image time.

reference_height.description: Used for determining the intersection of the look vector with the ellipsoid.

interpolation_method.description: The type of interpolation method to use.
